events.comment:
Here is an example with some events that have been replaced by code blocks.
Note that not all events have been translated to code.

Every code block is followed by the equivalent events (that are disabled, so they are not run by GDevelop - only the code is).
Special comments /** @type {...} */ are added to give a hint to the editor about the type of the object that we are manipulating. It's useful to get autocompletion!
Change the animation according to what the player do.
events.comment2: On change l'animation en fonction de ce que fait le joueur.

events.comment: Make sure the camera follows the player.
events.comment2: On s'assure que la caméra suit le joueur.
Gestion des collisions avec le joueur:
